metas.section_1_description: In 2017, the Government of Vanuatu launched the Vanuatu Citizenship by investment program, also known as the Development Support Program (DSP), to provide individuals and families with a pathway to obtain Vanuatu Citizenship and benefit from numerous advantages, including greater travel freedom and the ability to enjoy the unique culture and natural beauty of Vanuatu, a tropical paradise in the South Pacific.
metas.section_2_title: CITIZENSHIP INVEST IS <br class="mobile-only"> GOVERNEMENT AUTHORIZED
metas.section_2_description: Citizenship Invest is a government-authorized firm for obtaining Vanuatu citizenship and passport. The company has a track record <br class="desktop-only"> of success processing citizenship for applicants and their families from over 85 countries worldwide.
metas.section_3_collapsed:
The Vanuatu Citizenship’s Office and Commission (COC) is a statutory entity established by the Vanuatu Citizenship Act [Cap 112]. The Act was enacted by the Parliament of the Republic of Vanuatu and came into force in 1980. It was amended in 2013 and twice in 2014.
Based on the Citizenship Act [CAP 112], the Vanuatu Citizenship’s Office and Commission (COC) grants Honorary Citizenship to individuals under Vanuatu’s Development Support Program (DSP).
metas.section_5_description: Vanuatu Citizenship offers Visa-Free to 98 Countries including Monaco, Ireland, Singapore, Hong Kong
metas.section_5_countries_note: *The list of countries is subject to variations depending on each government's policy and so is access to these countries.
metas.section_7_description: Investors have one main investment option to acquire citizenship through Vanuatu Citizenship by investment program
metas.section_7_bottom_description: In addition to the required investment, there are other expenses associated with Vanuatu citizenship by investment programs, such as Citizenship Invest professional fees, official application forms, citizenship and passport certification, courier charges, and other related expenditures. Moreover, you will receive a detailed quotation tailored to your situation with no hidden fees.
metas.section_8_description: To ensure the integrity of the Vanuatu citizenship by investment program, background checks are required and paid for by the government. The government appoints a preferred due diligence agency that conducts checks using various international and local sources, such as Interpol, World-Check, and other government agencies. These fees must be paid at the time the application is submitted.
metas.section_8_list_2_bold_title: Due diligence normally takes four to six weeks to complete and includes the following checks:
metas.section_8_bottom_description: The Vanuatu Citizenship by Investment program has successfully attracted applicants from all over the world. The investment funds are safe as they are only payable once the citizenship application is approved by the Government. Citizenship Invest is helping hundreds of families changing their lives through this program.
metas.section_9_description: The estimated time to receive citizenship approval depends on the due diligence processing time and the specific case

metas.section_11_bottom_description: Citizenship Invest 为每个案件分配一个文件收集专家。我们提供定制化服务，通过要求客户提供最基本的文件简化申请流程。我们的工作是尽可能简化文件收集过程，当需要时，我们可以在未经客户参与的情况下为其获取文件。请注意，下面的清单仅供参考。Citizenship Invest 根据具体案件评估后会创建一个个性化的清单。
metas.section_3_list_0_Description: 获取瓦努阿图公民身份的平均办理时间为2个月。
metas.section_3_list_1_Description: 98个国家提供免签入境政策，包括新加坡和香港。
metas.section_3_list_2_Description: 瓦努阿图国籍可以通过一次性无偿捐赠获得。
metas.section_3_list_4_Description: 配偶、26岁以下的子女和50岁以上的老年父母。
metas.section_4_card_0_description:
通过投资瓦努阿图国籍，您和您的家人可以享受终身不可撤销的国籍福利。

您的未来家庭成员也可以通过血统获得国籍。

投资灵活性
该计划在资金转移方面非常灵活。

只有在获得瓦努阿图国籍之后才需要支付投资款项，而不是之前。
metas.section_4_card_1_description:
瓦努阿图护照持有人可以免签证前往98个国家，包括摩纳哥、爱尔兰、新加坡和香港。

轻松获得签证
瓦努阿图公民权提供了轻松的旅游签证，随时可以使用。

section_4_card_2_Image.post_title: Tax Free and Tax Haven Written on a piece of paper showing the wealth protection benefits of the citizenship by investment program
section_4_card_2_Image._wp_attachment_image_alt: Tax Free and Tax Haven Written on a piece of paper showing the wealth protection benefits of the citizenship by investment program

metas.section_4_card_2_description:
资本增值、礼物、财富和遗产均不征税，非居民也不需要缴税。

此外，瓦努阿图公民权还享有无限制汇利润和引进资本的权利。

全球银行业务访问
作为瓦努阿图的公民，您可以在全球知名银行机构开设银行账户。
metas.section_7_options_0_description: 通过瓦努阿图投资移民计划获得瓦努阿图公民身份，申请人必须向政府基金作出一项不可退还的财务捐赠。
metas.section_7_options_0_description_2: 投资捐赠的金额根据申请人数量和年龄而有所不同。
metas.section_8_list_0_name: 每个申请的尽职调查费用
metas.section_8_list_2_1_list_content: Criminal checks in countries the applicant spent over 6 months in the past 10 years
metas.section_8_list_2_2_list_content: Checks on financial history, including the source of cash for the investment
metas.section_8_list_2_3_list_content: Reputation checks with relevant international authorities and databases.
metas.section_9_list_0_description: Citizenship Invest (CI) will pre-screen your passport before starting the Vanuatu citizenship application process, and an initial down payment of CI Professional Fees is required to begin your application. CI dedicated Document Collection team will assist you gathering the necessary documents for FIU's initial approval (Vanuatu Financial Intelligence Unit). Government Processing Fees, Due Diligence, and CI submission fees are payable once the file is ready. Approval in Principle is issued by the Vanuatu Financial Intelligence Unit. Remaining documents are submitted and 25% of the Government contribution is payable.
metas.section_9_list_1_description:
Due Diligence report is issued to the Government. Based on the results, the Government makes a decision on your Citizenship application. Once approved you are invited to pay the donation or investment. At this stage the ramaining 75% of the Government financial contribution is payable.

Vanuatu Passport and citizenship certificates are issued. The remaining CI professional fee is due.
metas.section_11_cards_0_content: The applicant must be at least 18 years old.
metas.section_11_cards_1_content: 申请人必须没有犯罪记录，并且有良好的声誉。
metas.section_11_cards_2_content: 申请人必须身体健康，并提供医疗证明来证明。
metas.section_11_cards_3_content: 申请人必须提供投资资金来源的证据，没有被与瓦努阿图签订免签协议的国家拒签的记录，并且没有因国际组织制裁而受到旅行限制或制裁。
metas.section_12_list_0_question: 如何获得瓦努阿图投资公民身份？
metas.section_12_list_0_answer: 要通过投资成为瓦努阿图公民，选择像Citizenship Invest这样的政府授权的公司，并投资至少130,000美元用于经济发展和救灾。通过过程审核并提供投资证明后，您将获得入籍证书和护照申请。在瓦努阿图宣誓效忠或邀请官员到合适的地点进行宣誓。整个过程不需要语言或历史考试，并且可以远程完成。大约需要1-2个月的时间就可以获得公民身份。
metas.section_12_list_1_question: 获得瓦努阿图投资公民身份的时间线是多久？
metas.section_12_list_1_answer: 获得瓦努阿图投资公民身份的时间线大约为2个月。这是全球最快的公民身份获得时间线。通过过程审核并提供投资证明后，申请人可以在两个月内成为瓦努阿图公民。
metas.section_12_list_2_question: 瓦努阿图投资公民身份的好处是什么？
metas.section_12_list_2_answer: Vanuatu Citizenship by Investment program offers several benefits to investors. One of the most significant benefits is visa-free travel to 96 countries, including Singapore, Hong Kong, and Russia. The program is also the only citizenship program in the Asia-Pacific region. The entire procedure takes place remotely, and investors can obtain Vanuatu citizenship in 1-2 months. Vanuatu citizenship also offers no personal taxation, including no wealth tax, inheritance tax, gift tax, capital gains tax, or income tax. Additionally, the program provides added security in case of a crisis like a pandemic and diversifies assets. The investment amount goes to developing Vanuatu’s economy and fighting against natural disasters.
metas.section_12_list_3_question: How can I ensure my investment for Vanuatu Citizenship by Investment is secure?
metas.section_12_list_3_answer: Vanuatu has strengthened its Due Diligence rules to minimise money laundering risks and tax evasion. That is why you should work with a reputable and licensed agent for Vanuatu citizenship, such as Citizenship Invest, a government-approved organisation that offers this program.
metas.section_12_list_4_question: Can I include my family members in my application for Vanuatu Citizenship by Investment?
metas.section_12_list_4_answer: Yes, family members can be included in the Vanuatu Citizenship by Investment application. The family size determines the minimum investment amount, and investors can consist of their spouse, children, and parents in the citizenship application.
metas.section_14_list_0_review: I was hesitant to pursue a second citizenship, but the team at Citizenship Invest patiently and understandingly answered all of my questions and concerns. Throughout the entire procedure, they made me feel confident and supported.
metas.section_14_list_1_review: I was surprised at how simple and efficient the Citizenship Invest process was. They handled all the paperwork and logistics and kept me always updated. I felt like I was in good hands."
metas.section_14_list_2_review: What impressed me the most about Citizenship Invest was their dedication, transparency, and honesty. They were completely honest about all of the costs and procedures, and they never offered any misleading information or false promises.
metas.section_11_bottom_list_0_content:
• 提名表格。
  • 所有护照的复印件（经认证）。
  • 身份证明照片的复印件（经认证）。
  • 申请人在出生国、国籍国、居住国（如不同）以及申请人过去十年内曾居住至少一年的国家提供的原始警察记录，适用于年满16周岁及以上的每个申请人。
  • 个人简历包括教育和就业历史（主申请人+配偶）。
metas.section_11_bottom_list_1_title: 阶段2 - 提交完整文件
metas.section_11_bottom_list_1_content:
• 提名表格-完整文件。
  • 完整出生记录的原件摘录或带有外交部认证的完整出生证明的复印件（即包含父母信息的出生文档或户口簿等）。
  • 原始医疗证明。
  • 八张原始护照尺寸照片。
metas.section_11_bottom_list_2_title: 只需主申请人提供的额外表格和文件
metas.section_11_bottom_list_2_content:
• 一封来自国际公认银行的原始银行参考信，发信日期不超过六个月。
  • 最近六个月内开具的原始专业推荐信（例如律师、公证人、注册会计师或类似资格的专业人员）。
  • 一封原始的雇佣信。
  • 大学/学院学位证书的经认证复印件。
  • 居住证明（原始公用事业账单/有效租赁合同的复印件）。
metas.section_11_bottom_list_3_title: 夫妻申请时需要提供的文件
metas.section_11_bottom_list_3_content:
• 婚姻记录原文摘录或经MOFA认证的结婚证书副本（如适用）。
  • 经MOFA认证的离婚文件副本（如适用）。
metas.section_3_list_5_Description: 对于年满18岁的个人，有效期最初为五（5）年，然后在续期后为十（10）年。
metas.section_4_card_0_read_more:
双重国籍和隐私保护
您可以保留您现有的国籍而不放弃。

不会通知您的原籍国家您获得的瓦努阿图投资公民身份。

最低申请要求
不需要实际居住要求，您可以立即申请。

无需面试、语言测试、教育或管理经验。
